title: [K-12] Applying POEE Scaffolding Strategies for Self-Directed Inquiry-Based Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational Social Science Theories and Experience with Online Learning Tools
context.additional_context: Strengthening Self-Directed Learning Environments and Inquiry Skills in Social Studies Through Digital Devices

learning_goals: Learners can generate three or more inquiry questions predicting causes and effects of social phenomena using the POEE strategy
Learners can analyze and observe data collected through digital interfaces to explain two or more social phenomenon patterns
Learners can write inquiry reports reflecting peer feedback and record self-directed learning reflections four or more times
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
